InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input of the filter.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RL
DoubleVectorProperty.label: rL (physical box side length)
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The box side length used to wrap particles around if they exceed rL (or less than 0) in any dimension (only positive positions are allowed in the input, or they are wrapped around).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Overlap
DoubleVectorProperty.label: overlap (shared point/ghost cell gap distance)
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The space (in rL units) to extend processor particle ownership for ghost particles/cells. Needed for correct halo calculation when halos cross processor boundaries in parallel computation.

IntVectorProperty.name: NP
IntVectorProperty.label: np (number of seeded particles in one dimension, i.e., total particles = np^3)
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Number of seeded particles in one dimension. Therefore, total simulation particles is np^3 (cubed).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BB
DoubleVectorProperty.label: bb (linking length)
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Linking length measured in units of interparticle spacing and is dimensionless. Used to link particles into halos for the friends-of-friends (FOF) algorithm.

IntVectorProperty.name: PMin
IntVectorProperty.label: pmin (minimum particle threshold for an FOF halo)
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Minimum number of particles (threshold) needed before a group is called a friends-of-friends (FOF) halo.

IntVectorProperty.name: CopyHaloDataToParticles
IntVectorProperty.label: Copy FOF halo catalog to original particles
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, the friends-of-friends (FOF) halo catalog information will be copied to the original particles as well.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeMostBoundParticle
IntVectorProperty.label: Compute the most bound particle
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, the most bound particle for an FOF halo will be calculated. WARNING: This can be very slow.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeMostConnectedParticle
IntVectorProperty.label: Compute the most connected particle
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, the most connected particle for an FOF halo will be calculated. WARNING: This can be very slow.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeSOD
IntVectorProperty.label: Compute spherical overdensity (SOD) halos
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, spherical overdensity (SOD) halos will be calculated in addition to friends-of-friends (FOF) halos.

IntVectorProperty.name: SODCenterType
IntVectorProperty.label: initial SOD center
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The initial friends-of-friends (FOF) center used for calculating a spherical overdensity (SOD) halo. WARNING: Using MBP or MCP can be very slow.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RhoC
DoubleVectorProperty.label: rho_c
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: rho_c (critical density) for SOD halo finding.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MinRadiusFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: minimum radius factor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Minimum radius factor for SOD finding.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaxRadiusFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: maximum radius factor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum radius factor for SOD finding.

IntVectorProperty.name: SODBins
IntVectorProperty.label: number of bins
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Number of bins for SOD finding.

IntVectorProperty.name: MinFOFSize
IntVectorProperty.label: minimum FOF size
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Minimum FOF halo size to calculate an SOD halo.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MinFOFMass
DoubleVectorProperty.label: minimum FOF mass
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Minimum FOF mass to calculate an SOD halo.
